description:
Stronger than human beings and with superficial power, `Robotex` are metal organisms from outer space with infinite power coming out from a spin top shaped core. But they are prohibited to have their own creativity, restricted by the `Main Frame`. Suspicious about `Main Frame`, the three `Robotex` Kai, Taff, and Iota escape and accidentally land on Earth.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Encounter of Metallic Life Forms: Part 1
